name: Mike

responses.introduction: Hi, have you seen my robot? It seems to have gone astray...
responses.ignored Return: Sorry, I can't really talk right now.
responses.Falsely Accused: Sorry, I don't think I should talk to you.
responses.Big Footprint: Those would fit me I think. Or %NPC.
responses.Small Footprint: Sorry, bit too small for me. Could be %NPC's.
responses.Glasses: Yes, I do need glasses these days. Those look more like %NPC's though.
responses.Bag: I do have a bag with me, yes. %NPC and I always carry a bag.
responses.Lipstick: Erm... no, I don't wear lipstick... Maybe you should ask %NPC?
responses.Right Handed: Yes, I am right handed. But so is %NPC.
responses.Dark Hair: I would say my hair is dark, yes. Not as dark as %NPC's, though.
responses.Erotic Novel: Ah, a fellow lover of 50 Spades of Hay! You should come for a drink with me and %NPC!
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: I'm afraid I can't help you there, friend. Try %NPC instead.
responses.Car Keys: My car is the same make as those keys! So is %NPC's. It's quite common.
responses.Knife: I'm not much of a chef I'm afraid - you should ask %NPC!
responses.Cricket Bat: No hand-eye coordination at all, not like %NPC!
responses.Energy Drink: Oh yes, these keep me going when I'm marking assessments through the night! I know they really help %NPC too.
responses.Red Scarf: Ooh that looks warm and cosy, could be homemade! Not mine, but I know %NPC knits.
responses.Hardware Magazine: Oh yes, this is my favourite magazine! %NPC gets me a subscription for my birthday every year.
responses.Diamond Ring: That's very pretty. I think I saw %NPC wearing it earlier?
responses.Receipt: Ah yes I shop there all the time! I often see %NPC in there too.
responses.USB Stick: I'm a bit more savvy these days, you should ask %NPC. They're a bit of a dinosaur.
responses.Sweet Wrapper: Could be mine! I offered %NPC a toffee earlier.

noneResponses: Sorry I have some marking to get on with.
I'm not sure why I should help you exactly.

motives.Adam: He drives a Corvette. Enough said.
motives.Colin: He once borrowed a soldering iron off me and never gave it back.
motives.Diana: She thought I was a waiter and insulted my facial hair. The impudence!
motives.Horatio: He almost knocked me off my bike on the way here.
motives.Kyle: He's a lousy conversationalist. I almost fell asleep in my soup.
motives.Lily: Her mutt bred with my pedigree! Those puppies will be so ugly.
motives.Mary: She chained her bike to mine once. I was stranded for three hours.
motives.Roger: So disrespectful - he just got on my every nerve.
motives.Will: He used to deliver my paper and everyday would throw it right into the fish pond. I lost thousands!
